title: Twitter Unveils an Edit Button, Finally
Illumina defeats F.T.C. in major antitrust case.
description: The case was seen as a test of a more aggressive policy by the agency.

title: Abortion Rights Loom Larger in Investment Decisions
description: After the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, Alinea, an investing app geared toward young adults, saw a new focus on companies that support reproductive health.

title: When Wedding Planning Is More Like Online Shopping
description: For those who crave efficiency, some websites tackle wedding planning with an add-to-cart approach.

title: Google Employee Who Played Key Role in Protest of Contract With Israel Quits
description: The worker said the company had tried to retaliate against her activism opposing a deal with the Israeli military, while co-workers argued the company had an anti-Palestinian bias.

title: Tech Companies Slowly Shift Production Away From China
description: Worried about geopolitical tensions and stung by pandemic shutdowns, Google, Apple and others are moving some work to nearby countries.

title: Las cinco respuestas que necesitas para entender la ‘fusión’ de Ethereum
description: Esto es lo que debes saber sobre una importante actualización de software a Ethereum, la plataforma criptográfica más popular.
